summary: Whistleblowers play an important role in safeguarding the federal government against fraud, waste, and abuse. In 2013, a pilot program expanded the whistleblower rights of contractors at civilian agencies against reprisal (such as firing or demotion). For example, the program expanded the persons and entities to which a whistleblower can disclose misconduct. However, we found that some agencies did not forward investigations to the appropriate...
title: Contractor Whistleblower Protections Pilot Program: Improvements Needed to Ensure Effective Implementation
